channel.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
channel.description:
I think he's really could see into the future
wanna knoe about him?
Here:[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nostradamus]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nostradamus[/url]

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

I saw this on discovery channel. One was saying we’re suppose to get hit by a huge asteroid in 2006 but did it happen?

Of course not. People exaggerate stuff so much. That twin tower quote can be 2 brothers fighting and lighting shut on fire.

Believe what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Swordskid61:

yea. but he wrote it for us to AVOID these things.

That makes it even more bullshit.

Read full topic

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:26, topic:155372”][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=212099.msg1875579#msg1875579 date=1194542448]
Its More Like…uh… a guideline to our future, He said that time isnt written in stone. He wrote us a guideline to what can happen, not what HAS to happen.
[/quote]

The point is, if you write almost a thousand possible things that could happen, you’re bound to get something right.[/quote]
yea. but he wrote it for us to AVOID these things.

Read full topic

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:24, topic:155372”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=212099.msg1855155#msg1855155 date=1193718872]

no one can detet the future it impossible someone just wrote it down for money

I would have to agree.

I have a relative who claims he can talk to the dead, and he went against my side of the family(Scientology/Christian) so my mom(Who is the one related to him) has lost all contact with him. Now he’s making millions selling his bull shit.

There is no way to tell.
[/quote]

I don’t deny the fact that people can easily, and do, manage to convince people they can talk to the dead, or do other unexplained things to stand out. However, you shouldn’t say it can’t happen, simply because you don’t want to believe that it can, or because it is deemed impossible or unexplainable by the bounds of modern science.

However, back on topic, Nostradamus wrote 942 quatrains, poems with 4 lines. That’s a possible 942 future “predicaments”.[/quote]
Its More Like…uh… a guideline to our future, He said that time isnt written in stone. He wrote us a guideline to what can happen, not what HAS to happen.

Read full topic

@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:18, topic:155372”][quote author=Enjoy me now link=topic=212099.msg1855117#msg1855117 date=1193718270]
no one can detet the future it impossible someone just wrote it down for money
[/quote]
I would have to agree.

I have a relative who claims he can talk to the dead, and he went against my side of the family(Scientology/Christian) so my mom(Who is the one related to him) has lost all contact with him. Now he’s making millions selling his bull shit.

There is no way to tell.[/quote]

I don’t deny the fact that people can easily, and do, manage to convince people they can talk to the dead, or do other unexplained things to stand out. However, you shouldn’t say it can’t happen, simply because you don’t want to believe that it can, or because it is deemed impossible or unexplainable by the bounds of modern science.

However, back on topic, Nostradamus wrote 942 quatrains, poems with 4 lines. That’s a possible 942 future “predicaments”.

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

Yes, But he didnt know about planes or Buildings as large as the twin towers.
So.
He thought of them as twins, so its likely he said the twin brothers.and he probably didn’t know the name of the city so he called it the “New City”

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

Well he was apperantley able to see to the year of 3171 or something so what about it? If he could see these things then he wouldn’t EXACTLY know what it was he put it in the best discription he could think of.

Read full topic

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

But if you read the quote I posted, it does not say “new century and nine months”, it says “seventh month in 1999”. New York is not at 45 degrees anyway, and this quote didn’t mention twin brothers. Even if another one of his writings DID mention twin brothers - why would he not just say “two big buildings” if he was good enough to predict dates?

Read full topic

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

In the year of the new century and nine months
September
The sky will burn at forty-five degrees
New York State
2 twin brothers torn apart by chaos
Twin Towers

It Might now sound like him but it kind of sound like he wrote it. Maybe.

Read full topic

item.title: Nostradomas Fake or not?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Why would they post wrong information? Because they make MILLIONS of dollars from doing so.

If you seek out the original quote, it is radically different from what you posted, and dosen’t really seem relevant to the twin towers at all, in my opinion. He even got the date wrong.

EDIT:

The original which this is mostly based on:

L'an mil neuf cens nonante neuf sept mois Du ciel viendra vn grand Roy d'effrayeur Resusciter le grand Roy d'Angolmois, Auant apres Mars regner par bon heur.

Translated (not by me):

The year 1999, seventh month, From the sky will come a great King of Terror: To bring back to life the great King of the Mongols, Before and after Mars to reign by good luck.

The perpetrators of this hoax have obviously taken bits from other Nostradamus writings, but I have no idea which ones.
You get the point, though.

Read full topic

i got it from his website why would they post wrong information?

But. Think about it. Really.

item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

Mopman:

I’ve never managed to find one that sounded even remotely true. Feel free to post a quote.

i’ll find one 1 minuite.

EDIT:

> "In the year of the new century and nine months, > From the sky will come a great King of Terror... > The sky will burn at forty-five degrees. > Fire approaches the great new city..." > "In the city of york there will be a great collapse, > 2 twin brothers torn apart by chaos > while the fortress falls the great leader will succumb > third big war will begin when the big city is burning" > > - NOSTRADAMUS

Read full topic
